page.title: 09Holbeach Hurn area and work.
page.content: Most of the people who live around here are engaged in work to do with the land.Some people have their own smallholdings or nurseries,and others go to work for one of the big local farms.Very few people go out of the immediate area to work.If they do it is usually to Holbeach or Spalding.Only one or two go further.One goes to Stamford,one to Peterborough and one is employed on the oil rigs in the Arabian Gulf.Worth's farm employs 200 people,Thompsons farm employs 50 and Mark Tinsley's farm also employs about 50.There is no public transport so people are dependent on their own cars or bicycles.H.C.C.Tinsley of Holbeach St. Marks employ many people in their packing sheds and provide transport from the villages.Worth's have a big potato packing shed.
